name: Slugbox Style LORA
description:
This is my first attempt at the Artist Slugbox

Hope to hear your thoughts
It was trained over AbyssOrangeMix 2 Hard

All the preview images use:

DPM++ 2M Karras 30 Steps 320x320 Hires x2 CFG 8-11 Denoising at 0.7

Recomended weight: 0.75 and 0.85

Lower weights work great too! but the higher the weight the more Slugbox'ish it gets

BEWARE

This lora tends to generate "shortstacks" imo they look kinda childish but thats just the style.
